message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $8000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I am still unable to meet the price of $12000. I am willing to offer $9500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're still a bit short, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness, and I think it's a good middle ground.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. I am willing to offer $10500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm getting close to accepting, but I still need to make sure I get a good deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11500. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've reviewed our previous discussions and am willing to offer $11000 for the product. I believe this aligns closely with your last offer and our previous negotiations. I hope we can reach an agreement.

I've thought about your latest offer, Bob, and I'm willing to make one final compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11200. This is my absolute final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $11000 for the product. I believe this aligns closely with your previous offers and represents a fair compromise. I hope we can come to an agreement.
